original_text: This is how he made the water carts: He made them with bronze sides, which he fixed to bronze bars at the edges.
korean_text: 그 받침 수레의 구조는 이러하니 사면 옆 가장자리 가운데에는 판이 있고

sentences.original_text: This is how he made the water carts
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 물 수레를 만든 방법은 이러했다

sentences.original_text: He made them with bronze sides
which he fixed to bronze bars at the edges
